search qualcomm stadium, charger play home game sinc 1967 san diego charger profession american footbal franchis base san diego, california. member west divis american footbal confer (afc) nation footbal leagu (nfl). charger franchis found 1959 barron hilton play 1960 season lo angel part american footbal leagu (afl). next season, charger move san diego, becom san diego chargers.[1] franchis experienc three major period success. first 1960 1965, charger afl west champion five time afl champion once. second 1978 1982, charger win season (season win losses) years, three consecut divis championship second time franchis history. recent accomplish rang 2004 2009, franchis reach playoff five time six years. super bowl appear 1994. charger experienc three notabl period decline. 1970 1977, charger never game lost part 13-year period without play postseason, includ four consecut year last divis 1972 1975, year bottom two late win avoid nfl' first 0–14 season. 1983 1991, never place higher third divis make playoffs. 1996 2003, team win seasons, worst season ever, win one 16 game 2000.[2] charger divis champion nine time includ 2009, afc west. confer champion six times, sinc afl-nfl merger 1970. end 2010 season, charger play 787 regular post-season game 51 seasons, appear post-season 16 times.[2] seasons[edit] note: finish, wins, losses, tie column list regular season result exclud post-season play. afl champion (1960–1969) confer champion divis champion wild card berth season team leagu confer divis regular season post-season result award head coach finish win loss tie lo angel charger 1960 1960 afl west 1st 10 4 0 lost afl championship (oilers) 24–16 sid gillman san diego charger 1961 1961 afl west 1st 12 2 0 lost afl championship (oilers) 10–3 sid gillman 1962 1962 afl west 3rd 4 10 0 earl faison (asg mvp) sid gillman 1963 1963 afl west 1st 11 3 0 afl championship (1) (patriots) 51–10 lanc alworth (mvp) keith lincoln (asg mvp) sid gillman 1964 1964 afl west 1st 8 5 1 lost afl championship (bills) 20–7 keith lincoln (asg mvp) sid gillman 1965 1965 afl west 1st 9 2 3 lost afl championship (bills) 23–0 frank buncom (asg mvp) sid gillman 1966 1966 afl west 3rd 7 6 1 sid gillman 1967 1967 afl west 3rd 8 5 1 speedi duncan (asg mvp) sid gillman 1968 1968 afl west 3rd 9 5 0 sid gillman 1969 1969 afl west 3rd 8 6 0 john hadl (asg mvp) charli waller 1970[a] 1970 nfl afc west 3rd 5 6 3 charli waller 1971 1971 nfl afc west 3rd 6 8 0 harland svare (2–2) sid gillman (4–6) 1972 1972 nfl afc west 4th 4 9 1 harland svare 1973 1973 nfl afc west 4th 2 11 1 harland svare (1–6–1) ron waller (1–5) 1974 1974 nfl afc west 3rd 5 9 0 wood (oroy) tommi prothro 1975 1975 nfl afc west 4th 2 12 0 tommi prothro 1976 1976 nfl afc west 3rd 6 8 0 tommi prothro 1977 1977 nfl afc west 3rd 7 7 0 tommi prothro 1978 1978[b] nfl afc west 3rd 9 7 0 tommi prothro (1–3) coryel (8–4) 1979 1979 nfl afc west 1st 12 4 0 lost division playoff (oilers) 17–14 coryel 1980 1980 nfl afc west 1st[c] 11 5 0 division playoff (bills) 20–14 lost confer championship (raiders) 34–27 coryel 1981 1981 nfl afc west 1st[d] 10 6 0 division playoff (dolphins) 41–38 (ot)[e] lost confer championship (bengals)[f] 27–7 kellen winslow (pb mvp) coryel 1982[g] 1982 nfl afc 6th 6 3 0 first-round playoff (steelers) 31–28 lost second-round playoff (dolphins) 34–13 dan fout (opoy, pb mvp) coryel 1983 1983 nfl afc west 5th 6 10 0 coryel 1984 1984 nfl afc west 5th 7 9 0 coryel 1985 1985 nfl afc west 3rd 8 8 0 coryel 1986 1986 nfl afc west 5th 4 12 0 lesli o'neal (droy) coryel (1–7) al saunder (3–5) 1987[h] 1987 nfl afc west 3rd 8 7 0 dan hen 1988 1988 nfl afc west 4th 6 10 0 dan hen 1989 1989 nfl afc west 5th 6 10 0 dan hen 1990 1990 nfl afc west 4th 6 10 0 bobbi ross 1991 1991 nfl afc west 5th 4 12 0 bobbi ross 1992 1992 nfl afc west 1st 11 5 0 wild-card playoff (chiefs) 17–0 lost division playoff (dolphins) 31–0 bobbi ross 1993 1993 nfl afc west 4th 8 8 0 bobbi ross 1994 1994 nfl afc west 1st 11 5 0 division playoff (dolphins) 22–21 confer championship (steelers) 17–13 lost super bowl xxix (49ers) 49–26 bobbi ross 1995 1995 nfl afc west 2nd 9 7 0 lost wild card playoff (colts) 35–20 bobbi ross 1996 1996 nfl afc west 3rd 8 8 0 bobbi ross 1997 1997 nfl afc west 5th 4 12 0 kevin gilbrid 1998 1998 nfl afc west 5th 5 11 0 kevin gilbrid (2–4) june jone (3–7) 1999 1999 nfl 12 0 marti schottenheim 2004 2004 nfl afc west 1st 12 4 0 lost wild card playoff (jets) 20–17 (ot) marti schottenheim (coy) drew bree (cbpoy) marti schottenheim 2005 2005 nfl afc west 3rd 9 7 0 shawn merriman (droy) marti schottenheim 2006 2006 nfl afc west 1st 14 2 0 lost division playoff (patriots) 24–21 ladainian tomlinson (mvp, opoy) marti schottenheim 2007 2007 nfl afc west 1st 11 5 0 wild card playoff (titans) 17–6 division playoff (colts) 28–24 lost confer championship (patriots) 21–12 norv turner 2008 2008 nfl afc west 1st 8 8 0 wild card playoff (colts) 23–17 (ot) lost division playoff (steelers) 35–24 norv turner 2009 2009 nfl afc west 1st 13 3 0 lost division playoff (jets) 17–14 norv turner 2010 2010 nfl afc west 2nd 9 7 0 norv turner 2011 2011 nfl afc west 2nd 8 8 0 norv turner 2012 2012 nfl afc west 2nd 7 9 0 norv turner 2013 2013 nfl afc west 3rd 9 7 0 wild card playoff (bengals) 27–10 lost division playoff (broncos) 24–17 philip river (cbpoy) mike mccoy 2014 2014 nfl afc west 3rd 9 7 0 mike mccoy 2015 2015 nfl afc west 4th 4 12 0 mike mccoy total 421 420 11 (1960–2015, regular season only) 11 17 — (1960–2015, post-season game only) 432 437 11 (1960–2015, total games; 1 afl championship, 3 nfl titles) footnotes[edit] result afl-nfl merger, leagu broken two conferences; afl team move american footbal conference. b season includ holi roller game. c charger finish ahead oakland afc west base better net point divis games. charger finish ahead denver bronco base better division record. e game known epic miami. f game known freezer bowl. g 1982 season shorten strike, leagu divid two confer instead normal division alignment. h strike 1987 reduc regular season schedul 16 15 games. references[edit] gener "san diego charger (1960–present)". sport
